title: Gakkou no Kaidan
synopsis: After the tragic loss of their mother, Satsuki Miyanoshita and her little brother Keiichirou find themselves attending the local elementary school of their mother’s hometown. Satsuki soon discovers that her mother had once fought against evil spirits and compiled a book to help against these threats. With the help of her mother’s book, Satsuki and Keiichirou, along with their friends Hajime Aoyama, Reo Kakinoki and Momoko Koigakubo, face the supernatural phenomena around them.
